description.narrative: The project entails an IFC equity investment of up to US$25 million in TPG Alternative and Renewable Technology Partners, L.P., a 10-year closed end Delaware limited partnership (TPG ART or the Fund). The Fund is targeting US$350 million and aims to invest in companies dedicated to developing and deploying climate friendly technologies in various sectors, primarily, but not limited to, industrial biotechnology, advanced materials and energy efficiency deployments. An investment in this Fund is an opportunity to support (i) commercialization and scaling up of innovative climate friendly technologies (ii) transfer of climate friendly technologies to emerging markets (iii) flow of investment capital to emerging markets.

i. Private Sector Development: Providing high margin products to be manufactured in emerging markets enabling these countries to export higher value products, thus capturing margin and reinvesting these margins within country ii. Mitigation: Reduced GHG emissions per unit of energy produced by using the alternative technology iii. Job Creation: Investments in commercialization and scaling up lead to substantial job creation in the developing countries iv. Deployment of innovative climate friendly technologies to emerging markets v. Incorporating IFC's E&S standards, thereby contributing to responsible and sustainable economic development

participating-org.narrative: TPG ALTERNATIVE AND RENEWABLE TECHNOLOGIES PARTNERS LP

mailing-address.narrative: Mr. Geoffrey Duyk Managing Director TPG ART Phone: +1-415-743-1662 /1-415-217-9147/1-415-743-6343 Email: mailto:kfukumura@tpg.com 345 California Street, Suite 3300 San Francisco, CA 94104 USA

name.narrative: TPG ART fund is a Delaware Limited Partnership and will be managed by the TPG ART team which is mainly based in San Francisco, California, USA. Some new hires will be likely based in the U.S., Europe, Brazil and other countries. TPG ART seeks to take innovative technologies from US/EU and deploy and scale them across emerging markets through their global platforms.
